keyMoments.title: Rescued by Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The crew is rescued by their ship, the Going Merry, which miraculously arrives at Enies Lobby on its own.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the bond between ship and crew, setting up the emotional farewell to come.

keyMoments.title: Successful Escape from Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat crew successfully escapes Enies Lobby, evading the Buster Call and leaving the World Government's judicial island in ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a major victory against the World Government and establishes the crew as a serious threat to the world order.

keyMoments.title: Spandam Defeated by Robin
keyMoments.description: CP9 director Spandam has his spine broken by Nico Robin, completely incapacitating him.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the complete defeat of CP9's leadership and the end of their mission to transport Robin.

keyMoments.title: Escape on Puffing Tom
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family successfully evacuates Enies Lobby aboard the Puffing Tom sea train.
keyMoments.significance: Ensures the allies who helped assault Enies Lobby make it out safely.

keyMoments.title: Foremen Escape on Puffing Tom
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La foremen successfully evacuate Enies Lobby aboard the Puffing Tom.
keyMoments.significance: The shipwrights who helped assault Enies Lobby make it back safely to Water 7.
